author: stsp
msg: Add --depth option support to svn log --diff, as already exists for svn diff.
(log_entry_receiver): Pass depth from baton to svn_client_diff() API.
(svn_cl__log): Make sure that --depth is specified together with --diff.
Put the value of the --depth option, if any, into the log receiver baton.
By default the depth is 'infinity' as before.
Suggested by: Joel N. Weber II

author: markt
msg: Improve robustness. Custom components may use their own strings for event type.

author: hboutemy
msg: [MPIR-216] resolve artifact version for dependency-management report when version range used

author: jbellis
msg: JDBC CQL driver exposes getColumn for access to timestamp
